text: Vladimír Popelka (born 14 October 1948) is a former Czech cyclist. He competed in the tandem event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Czechoslovakia Category:Cyclists at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Litomyšl
title: Vladimír Popelka
